entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-29
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • `dotnet build` mangles invalid property specifications #37230
  • AOT compile gives incorrect error about Roslyn source generator coming from a ProjectReference #37228
  • Figure out how to keep the strict mode assembly version check running for some assemblies #37227
  • AssemblyIdentityMustMatch should emit different diagnostic ids for different cases #37225
  • Dotnet build does not set correct exit code when used with -graph parameter #37224
  • [Broken Build]: Dotnet Publish is not idempotent and deletes required Content #37222
  • SDK is incorrectly emitted SupportedOSPlatform("Windows7.0") #37220
  • Add-Migration not recognized after install of Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Tools #37205
  • lambda select bug #37202

Closed

  • [APICompat] CP0004 arguments are swapped #37199
  • Winget isn't listing .NET 8 for me #37201
  • `wasi-experimental` doesn't support Linux Arm64 #32686

PullRequests

Created

  • dotnet tool run roll-forward option #37231
    untriaged, Area-Tools
  • Fix install state file for MSI based installs #37223
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • don't use cookies to unblock CSRF workflows #37221
    untriaged, Area-Containers

Merged

  • Update AssemblyIdentityMustMatch.cs #37207
    untriaged, Area-ApiCompat
  • enforce behavior where ASPNETCORE_URLS overrides ASPNETCORE_HTTP(S)_PORTS #37219
    untriaged, Area-Containers

Updated

  • Add custom props imports around DB.props import Fixes #36749 #36777
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK
  • Disable Source Link in desktop WPF temp projects #37164
    Servicing-consider, Area-SourceLink
  • Also exempt RuntimeIdentifiers Fixes #35575 #36848
    Area-External, untriaged
  • Move `src/Tests` to `test` #37200
    untriaged, Area-dotnet new
  • [Issue #33697] New standalone `info` command #36943
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Create dummy AfterSdkPublish target Fixes #26710 #36850
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2325867 #36923
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.2xx' => 'main' #36804
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Added test for .user file in outer build #37192
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Use .NET 9.0 versions for task dependencies #37013
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Workload history 3 #36809
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Bump dockercredsprovider to pick up a bugfix #36707
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
